 Let’s dive into your expertise and explore how you apply your technical skills in practice.
3. **Value Interview:** 
 Let’s design a career path for you.

title: Senior Solution Architect
description:
**Company Description**
 We are a consulting company with a bunch of technology-interested and happy people!
   

  

 We love technology, we love design and we love quality. Our diversity makes us unique and creates an inclusive and welcoming workplace where each individual is highly valued.
   

  

 With us, each individual is her/himself and respects others for who they are and we believe that when a fantastic mix of people gather and share their knowledge, experiences and ideas, we can help our customers on a completely different level.
   

  

 We are looking for you who want to grow with us!
   

  

 With us, you have great opportunities to take real steps in your career and the opportunity to take great responsibility.
   

  

****Purpose of the Job:****
 The Solution Architect is responsible for translating business- and tech requirements into architecture blueprints and identifying areas in need of improvements, holistically evaluate the architecture and use deep technical expertise to understand the business impact of a technical components, recommending and implementing new solutions. Provide leadership related to the solution development by being responsible for the architecture and delivery of a solution or portfolio of solutions. The Solution Architect needs to ensure alignment with enterprise architecture standards, advancing the architecture towards the target state. The Solution Architect should also update stakeholders on roadmaps and implementation plans as needed.
   

  

****Responsibilities:****
* Define a shared technical and architectural vision focused on creating technical alignment for the full solution rather than concerns for specific components
* Contextualize strategic vision and direction; conduct analysis, identify opportunities, constraints and support strategic activities related to development and management of solutions
* Analyze, design, develop and maintain roadmaps and implementation plans
* Review, analyze and facilitate stakeholder understanding of business and technology implication of future direction; influence decisions
* Translate business and technical requirements into architectural blueprints and document all solution architecture design and analysis.
* Create architectural design to guide and contextualize solution development across initiatives that aligns with business and IT goals.
* Evaluate, design and analyze the implementation of solutions
* Provide necessary leadership, analysis and design tasks related to the development of technology solutions to ensure that solutions meet business needs and align with architectural governance and standards
* Develop architectural artefacts and maintain the toolbox including principles, guidelines, standards, etc.
* Ensure relevant technical strategies, policies, standards and practices are applied correctly across Technology programs/projects and products.
* Identify interdependencies and use holistic thinking to ensure the cross-team perspective. Provide consulting support around solution architecture to teams to ensure a product is aligned with the overall enterprise architecture
* Evaluate and drive continuous improvement, reducing technical debt, and enhancing end[1]to-end business value.
* Participate in internal and external activities related to technology matching and selection to ensure technology choice aligns with overall tech architecture and business strategy
* Work continuously with incorporating broader aspects such as overall product costs/revenue, data privacy & sovereignty, business continuity, information security, integration with other systems, etc
* Provide guidance and coaching to stakeholders to advise on options, risks, costs vs. benefits, impact, priorities, etc.
* Facilitate best practice sharing and teach architecture thinking to engineering and delivery community Handle Incident management, investigation and digital forensics


****Qualifications:****
* Provide architecture leadership and collaborate with the implementation team and other cross-functional teams for effective hand off of work to streamline the transition from design to project.
* Provide technical design and quality reviews at various milestones throughout project lifecycles.
* While being a specialist in a particular area of our architecture, you also have a width across a specific set of disciplines within the domain.
* Understand and visualize concepts that are not yet concrete, identify patterns and use your problem-solving skills, strong analytic ability, creativity and customer and business drive to find a solution and win support for your ideas.
* Able to create both high-level and low-level design documentation and technical specifications.
* Able to evaluate and develop governance structures, methodologies and compliance measures.
* Experience in architecting/designing solutions built on cloud, ideally but not limited to Google cloud platform & Azure.
* Experience in migrating or transforming legacy solutions to the cloud.
* Provide insight regarding industry technology trends and new technologies, assess their fit for purpose given business requirements and architectural guidelines.
* Ability to take the initiative and identify and address existing and potential obstacles, issues and opportunities.
* Show commitment and ownership and demonstrate attention to detail and accuracy.
* Effective team player that can express the importance of technical concepts and quality, emerging technologies, ideas, feelings, opinions, and conclusions to peers and people with an only limited technical background and contribute positively to your team environment


****Functional Knowledge:****
* Architecture and solution arch development
* Enterprise architecture
* Programming
* Integration management
* Google cloud platform & Azure (cloud infrastructure management)
* Deep technical knowledge and subject matter expert in Mobile Web Applications, Data Warehouse, and Analytics
* Broad technology experience in areas such as cloud architecture, cloud computing, applications development, relational databases, machine learning, storage, DevOps, containers, serverless, CI/CD, management and monitoring, cloud migrations, IT transformation
* Architecture frameworks and modelling techniques
* Functional and technical architecture
* Business and industry understanding, as well as business analysis
* Systems integration
* Technical change management
* Business process management
* Project Management and stakeholder management
* Software Development and Software Development Tools
* Agile in practice
* Stakeholder Management


****Behavioral:****
* Collaboration
* Empowerment
* Innovation
* Improvement
* Resourcefulness
* Honesty
* Clarity
* Open-minded and curious mindset


**We are looking for you who:**
**Start:** 
 Immediately
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Full-time until further notice, we apply 6 months probationary employment
   

  

 We interview candidates on an ongoing basis, do not wait to submit your application.

title: Kravledare QA
description:
Svenska kraftnät är en av de viktigaste aktörerna för en hållbar energiomställning. Som Kravledare QA erbjuds du ett av Sveriges viktigaste IT jobb, i vilket du varje dag kommer att bidra till Sveriges elförsörjning. Vi behöver dig för att lyckas med vårt samhällsviktiga uppdrag att elektrifiera Sverige.
   

  

 Vi är idag cirka 500 personer på IT och vi kommer att växa ytterligare de kommande åren. Detta för att kunna skapa förutsättningar för Sverige för att kunna fördubbla sin elproduktion och nå klimatmålen genom att helt ställa om till fossilfri energi. För att lyckas kommer vi att använda oss av den senaste tekniken för att öka kapaciteten i vår infrastruktur och samtidigt öka utvecklingstakten kring system, digitalisering och processer.
   

  

 Om tjänsten
   

  

 Som Kravledare QA arbetar du med att förstärka och bygga upp Svenska kraftnäts totala förmåga kring, primärt kravhantering, men även test. Du bidrar till att utveckla och implementera en strategi och process för hur vi skall arbeta med krav genom att till exempel utvärdera och införa nya verktyg och arbetssätt. Vi har flera stora projekt framför oss och det är viktigt att vår leveransmodell och organisation skall möjliggöra och stödja agila arbetssätt framöver.
   

  

 Du säkerställer kontinuerlig utveckling och förbättring av kravprocessen som integreras med vår projektstyrnings- och produktionsmodell, ITIL Change Management och utvecklingsprocessen. Du coachar projektledare och kravledare som driver projekt/förvaltning med IT-påverkan, men även utvecklingsteam för krav och test. Vidare stöttar och utbildar du våra medarbetare inom området över hela organisationen samt hanterar dokumentation.
   

  

 I rollen ges du möjligheten att leda, bidra och förbättra utvecklingen av vår framtida verksamhet. Du erbjuds en arbetsplats med stora utvecklingsmöjligheter inom området tillsammans med kollegor med lång erfarenhet inom branschen som möjliggör erfarenhetsutbyte och kompetensutveckling.
   

  

 Som Kravledare QA tillhör du enheten Utvecklingsförmågor och Verktyg där krav och testfunktionen finns på avdelningen Verksamhets och IT-utvecklingsstöd. Enheten består idag av cirka 13 engagerade och kompetenta medarbetare med varierande roller som till exempel IT-specialister, metod- och verktygsansvariga, IT-projektledare och förvaltningsledare.
   

  

 Om dig
   

  

 Eftersom rollen innefattar många kontaktytor söker vi dig som samarbetar bra tillsammans med andra. Du vet vikten av att skapa nya relationer såväl internt som externt i organisationen i syfte att nå uppsatta mål. Vår bästa kandidat kännetecknas av att organisera sitt arbete på ett effektivt sätt och gör det som krävs samt arbetar ambitiöst för att nå resultat.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Du har en akademisk examen från högskola eller universitet inom systemvetenskap eller liknande, alternativt har motsvarande kompetens förvärvats på annat sätt som Svenska kraftnät bedömer likvärdig. Vidare har du certifiering inom kravområdet, som exempelvis IREB, IREQ eller motsvarande.
   

  

**Du Har Även**
* Flerårig aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av kravställning med betydande inslag av IT, till exempel systemutveckling.
* Flerårig aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av att ta fram och etablera strategi, arbetssätt och processer inom kravområdet.
* Flerårig aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av att ha arbetat med något/några kravverktyg som till exempel Azure DevOps eller Jira.
* Flerårig aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av att leda och facilitera möten, workshops, utbildningar och dylikt.
* Du behärskar svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


 Det är meriterande om du har arbetslivserfarenhet inom testområdet som exempelvis Scrum Master, business analyst eller testledare. Vi ser det som en fördel om du har arbetslivserfarenhet av pm3, PPS eller DevOps samt erfarenhet av förändringsledning. Vidare vill vi gärna att du har arbetslivserfarenhet av agil kravställning.
   

  

 Bra att veta
   

  

* Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg.
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50 %
* Resor kan förekomma i denna tjänst.
* Sista ansökningsdag är den 6 september 2024. Vi tar inte emot personligt brev i samband med din ansökan.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning.


 Kontakta gärna Svenska kraftnäts samarbetspartner för denna roll, Johanna Bergstrand på Boxhill Recruitment, tel.nr 073-0250447 alt. johanna.bergstrand@bhill.se.
   

  

**Kontakter På Svenska Kraftnät**
 Rekryterande chef är Jonas Backlund. Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, tel. 010-475 87 72 och Mikael Hedenheim, ST, tel. 010-475 84 68. Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se.
   

  

**Övrig information**
 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.
   

  

 För mer information om säkerhetsprövning Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss: Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät

title: Software Engineer
description:
**Who we are:**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. We call this mission Power to Be You. Our assistive communication technology helps our customers express themselves, connect with the world, and pursue independence, whether through everyday activities like ordering food or extraordinary feats like running a company. Working at Tobii Dynavox, you’ll become part of a team that spans the globe, with offices in the US, Sweden, France, the UK, China, and beyond.
   

  

 To learn more about what we make possible, meet some of our customers or take a look at some of our products.
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
 We make touch and eye tracking based assistive technology for people with communication and mobility challenges. The success of our products has life-changing impact on our customers. Our Research & Development Team develops the hardware, software, and other technology that makes that impact possible.
   

  

 We are looking for a Software Engineer who will be responsible for driving products forward, working with the team to create solutions and fix bugs and contributing to continuous improvement in our software development processes. By delivering innovative and reliable software, you will contribute to the success of our organization and make a meaningful impact in the industry.
   

  

**Your days will be filled with:**
* Work with the team to develop high-quality software and design the architecture of our current and upcoming software products.
* Identify, prioritize, and execute tasks in the software development life cycle.
* Develop tools and applications by producing clean, reusable, and optimized code.
* Automate tasks through appropriate tools and scripting (mainly to improve and maintain quality).
* Review and debug code.
* Perform validation and verification testing.
* Collaborate with internal teams and vendors to fix and improve products.
* Ensure software is up-to-date with the latest technologies.


**We are looking for someone with:**
* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science or a related degree.
* Proven experience with a minimum of 6 years as a Software Engineer.
* Extensive experience in software development, CI/CD, and Agile ways of working.
* Experience using system monitoring tools and automated testing frameworks.
* Knowledge of programming languages C#, JavaScript (TypeScript, React) and designing cross platform UI (Windows/iOS)
* Experience in iOS Development
* Experience in Azure and Azure DevOps is preferable.
* Analytical mind with problem-solving aptitude.
* Ability to collaborate in both an internal and cross-functional team environment.
* Ability to work independently when needed.


**Next step:**
 Please address your questions to Mikaela Nilsson (mikaela.nilsson@tobiidynavox.com) and submit your resume (only in English) or LinkedIn profile through our website. We're looking forward to your application!
   

  

**Where we stand:**
 We believe diversity not only enriches our workplace culture, but also gives us a strategic advantage. Working with people from a variety of backgrounds and perspectives helps us all become better communicators, better problem solvers, and better human beings. Our differences make us stronger.
   

  

 Tobii Dynavox values equality of opportunity, human dignity, and racial/ethnic and cultural diversity. Tobii Dynavox does not discriminate against individuals on the basis of race, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, religion, disability, age, veteran status, ancestry, or national or ethnic origin.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity Employer/AA Women/Minorities/Veterans/Disabled

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
**Company Description**
 We are a consulting company with a bunch of technology-interested and happy people!
   

  

 We love technology, we love design and we love quality. Our diversity makes us unique and creates an inclusive and welcoming workplace where each individual is highly valued.
   

  

 With us, each individual is her/himself and respects others for who they are and we believe that when a fantastic mix of people gather and share their knowledge, experiences and ideas, we can help our customers on a completely different level.
   

  

 We are looking for you who want to grow with us!
   

  

 With us, you have great opportunities to take real steps in your career and the opportunity to take great responsibility.
   

  

**Job description:**
 We are looking for a senior DE profile (8-10 years) of experience in the space of data engineering etc. of which at least 4+ years of work experience including hands-on as either:
   

  

* Data engineer on modern cloud data platforms /or advanced analytics environments.
* Software Engineer with cloud technologies and infrastructure
* Experience in different data formats (Avro, Parquet)
* Experience in data query languages (SQL or similar)
* Experience in data centric programming using one of more programming languages Python, Java /or Scala. Python experience is preferred.
* Good understanding of different data modelling techniques and trade-offs
* Knowledge of NoSQL and RDBMS databases
* Experience in GCP tools Dataflow, Dataproc and Bigquery
* Experience in data processing framework Beam, Spark, Hive, Flink
* Take end-to-end responsibility to build, optimize and support of existing and new data products towards the defined target vision
* Be a champion of DevOps mindset and principles and able to manage CI/CD pipelines and terraform as well as Cloud infrastructure, in our context, it is GCP (Google Cloud Platform).
* Understanding data security principles, implementing role-based access controls, and adhering to data governance policies when working with sensitive information.
* Have a collaborative and co-creative mindset with excellent communication skills
* Motivated to work in an environment that allows you to work and take decisions independently
* Fluent in English, both written and verbal
* It is a plus if you have previous demonstrated experience in building retail customer segmentation


**Required cloud certification:** 
 GCP is good to have
   

  

**We are looking for you who:**
**Start:** 
 Immediately
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Full-time until further notice, we apply 6 months probationary employment
   

  

 We interview candidates on an ongoing basis, do not wait to submit your application.

title: Backendutvecklare
description:
Vill du utveckla morgondagens webbapplikationer, är du innovativ och gillar att lösa problem med dina kollegor? Vi söker dig som är en senior systemutvecklare med fokus på backendutveckling. Var med och bidra till skolans framtid!
   

  

****Om jobbet****
 I rollen som senior backendutvecklare blir du en del av teamet Informera och Kommunicera, som ansvarar för Skolverkets webbapplikationer såsom skolverket.se, Utbildningsguiden och Skolverkets intranät.
   

  

 Vi är mitt i en spännande teknikomställning där du arbetar med våra applikationer i Java och migrerar dem från Spring Boot till OpenShift, tar oss från SolR till Elasticsearch, samt är delaktig i arbetet som innebär att ta steget mot DevOps. Samtidigt arbetar vi med att ta applikationerna från on-premises-miljöer till molnbaserade lösningar. Vi är en bra bit på väg men du är med och påverkar den fortsatta utvecklingen.
   

  

 Vi är övertygade om att artificiell intelligens (AI) kommer att spela en avgörande roll i vår framtid. Därför inkluderar vi AI i vår tekniska strategi och planerar att implementera det i flera av våra applikationer för att bidra till att forma vår framtid.
   

  

 \* \* \* \* \*
   

  

 ”Hos oss får du möjlighet att utvecklas som utvecklare. Du får samtidigt vara med och utveckla vår viktiga verksamhet tillsammans med engagerade och kunniga kollegor.”
   

  

 Ann-Charlotte Djuphammar, enhetschef.
   

  

 \* \* \* \* \*
   

  

 Du tillhör en av våra enheter för utveckling och förvaltning, där du jobbar tillsammans med andra systemutvecklare, UX:are, testare, scrum masters, objektledare IT med flera. Enheten ingår i avdelningen för verksamhetsutvecklingsstöd med ca 120 medarbetare.
   

  

 På den här sidan kan du möta några kollegor inom it och övriga Skolverket www.skolverket.se/mot-oss
   

  

 Du arbetar på vårt moderna och rymliga kontor i Solna Business Park. Du kan också ha möjlighet att arbeta upp till 50% på distans.
   

  

****Om dig****
 För att göra ett bra jobb och trivas hos oss behöver du stå för och leva upp till den statliga värdegrunden och till våra kärnvärden för medarbetarskap: förebild, tillit, ansvar, samarbete och utveckling. Läs mer på skolverket.se/jobb
   

  

**I det här jobbet ska du ha**
* relevant utbildning inom IT som eftergymnasial eller högskoleutbildning alternativt erfarenhet som Skolverket bedömer som relevant,
* minst 5 års erfarenhet av Java och Spring Boot eller motsvarande,
* minst 5 års praktisk erfarenhet av Elasticsearch,
* kunskap om relationsdatabaser/databasdesign,
* goda kunskaper och erfarenhet REST APIer med JSON samt SOAP tjänster,
* goda kunskaper av versionshanteringssystem t.ex. GIT,
* erfarenhet att arbeta med ärendehanteringsverktyg såsom t.ex. Jira,
* erfarenhet av agil metodik t.ex. Scrum,
* mycket goda kunskaper i svenska i både i tal och skrift.


 Det är meriterande om du har praktisk erfarenhet av att arbeta med DevOps eller motsvarande, arbetat med CI/CD – Kontinuerlig integration, kontinuerlig leverans och testautomatisering och arbetat med att förädla byggprocesser med Jenkins och Maven. Det är även meriterande med erfarenhet av API-design med Swagger2 eller OpenAPI specification 3.0 och om du har arbetat med fler Java-ramverk, verktyg och applikationsservrar.
   

  

**Som person behöver du**
* vara prestigelös, initiativrik och ha förmåga att lösa problem,
* kunna arbeta strukturerat och ha en vilja att lyckas i din yrkesroll,
* ha en god analytisk förmåga och kunna hålla uppsatt plan för leverans,
* ha förmåga att se detaljerna i helheten och samarbeta obehindrat inom organisationen.


****Viktigt att veta****
 Sista ansökningsdag är 18 spetember. Anställningen är tillsvidare och inleds med provanställning i sex månader.
   

  

 När du registrerar din ansökan får du svara på några frågor i stället för att bifoga ett personligt brev. Läs gärna igenom ansökningsformuläret och förbered dina svar innan du gör ansökan.

title: Mjukvaruarkitekt inom databaser
description:
Välkommen till Skandia. Här kan din insats göra verklig skillnad. Det kräver förstås ditt engagemang och din vilja att utveckla dig själv, kollegorna och affären. Hos oss blandas lång erfarenhet med nya tankar och idéer - vi vill framåt tillsammans och ge långsiktigt värde. Vi bryr oss på riktigt, om jobbet och om varandra, så vi kan prestera och samtidigt må bra på vägen. Nu ser vi fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

**Mjukvaruarkitekt | Skandia | Stockholm**
 Vi söker nu en mjukvaruarkitekt till ett av våra team inom kundområdet, vars ansvar är att hantera Skandias system för kundinsikt. Systemet bygger på SQL server och är en central pusselbit för vår digitala kommunikation med kunder. Vi söker dig som är engagerad och erfaren inom området och som vill vara med och bidra till att stärka och vidareutveckla systemen tillsammans med oss!
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Skandia jobbar enligt Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe) för att kunna leverera smarta lösningar och applikationer med hög effektivitet och kvalitet till sina kunder. Det agila teamet består av erfarna utvecklare, testare, systemansvariga, scrummaster och product owner som arbetar med allt från kravförståelse, design och implementation i ett verksamhetskritisk och prioriterat område.
   

  

 Som mjukvaruarkitekt har du nyckelrollen i att koordinera och ansvara med övriga i teamet för att vidareutveckla och optimera CRM systemets databaser och flöden. Systemet är en databastung och integrationsintensiv lösning med flera integrationsmönster (Filer, DB till DB, API samt Events). Området är väldigt centralt för Skandia och du kommer att jobba nära verksamheten och ha tät dialog med arkitekter och utvecklare i andra team.
   

  

 I rollen kommer du bland annat att få arbeta med att:
   

  

* Leda teamets utvecklare i arkitekturella frågor.
* Utveckla lösningar som bl a bygger på SQL Server, SQL Server Integrations Services (SSIS) och Azure DevOps.
* Utveckla lösningar för realtidsuppdateringar av information.
* Samarbeta med andra arkitekter för att säkra helheten för Skandia.
* Ansvara för en långsiktigt hållbar mjukvaruarkitektur i applikationerna.
* Se till att vi fortsatt befinner oss i teknikens framkant.


 ,
   

  

 Du är idag erfaren mjukvaruarkitekt eller senior databasutvecklare som brinner för arkitektur och som vill både utveckla, ansvara för design och delta i kravdiskussioner.
   

  

 För att bli framgångsrik i din nya roll ser vi att du:
   

  

* Har erfarenhet av relationsdatabaser, BI, integration och databasmodellering, med fokus på Microsofts produktsvit.
* Du har djup DW kunskap inom Extract Transform Load (ETL) modellering och att definiera datakontrakt.
* Kan flytande svenska både i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande**
* Har erfarenhet av Customer Insight Data och Costumer Insights Journeys i D365 eller annan standaardiserad CRM plattform. Detta då Teamet utvecklar och förvaltar även Marketing Automationmodulen i Dynamics 365.


**Personliga egenskaper**
 Du motiveras av att arbeta i ett centralt team med mycket kontakter och med ett verksamhetskritiskt system med många integrationer. Det är viktigt att du känner till och anammar erkända principer och mönster och skriver tydlig och underhållbar kod som andra lätt kan förstå, samt inser värdet av automation av exempelvis övervakning, tester och release processen. Du är van att sätta dig in i och förstå affärens utmaningar.
   

  

 Du strävar efter kontinuerlig förbättring inom både teknik och arbetssätt och ser värdet av att arbeta i ett agilt team där kunskapsutbyte är en framgångsfaktor. Som person är du öppen och prestigelös med ett driv att utveckla både dig själv och andra.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

***Nu är vi på sommarsemester! Urval för denna rekrytering kommer att påbörjas i augusti.***

title: Experienced professionals to our SAP Supply Chain team (Stockholm)
description:
**Are you ready for the next step in your career and to be part of our successful team in Sweden?**

Deloitte is looking for talented and experienced professionals to join our SAP-team in Sweden. As a market leader, we work with both global and local organizations on complex transformations, including major business-driven IT changes. With approximately 25,000 SAP experts in over 135 countries, Deloitte is among SAP’s most valued strategic partners. This is why SAP has placed Deloitte within the highest strategic alliance partner category, and why we have been recognized as the Global Leader in SAP Services by leading consultancies and analysts such as Forrester and Gartner.


We are growing in the supply chain area and are looking for a SAP Supply Chain professional and/or SAP Procurement professional who has an appetite for delivering sustainable, business-driven projects and being excited to co-operate with the largest companies and well-known brands. You enjoy engaging with clients to understand their requirements and find solution options for key challenges in the supply chain area (e.g S2P, SD, WM, IBP, GTS) providing subject matter expertise with a good awareness of SAP and associated technologies within the process area.


**Qualifications**
------------------

Your most important attributes we’d like to see are:


* Experience of SAP consulting / SAP SME / Stream lead / Project Manager roles in transformation projects, being the expert of one or several SAP process areas such as MM, SD, WM, IBP, GTS.
* A good understanding of end-to-end business processes, SAP best practices, and latest industry trends.
* A good understanding of the SAP product roadmap and experience of SAP S/4HANA and other SAP technologies.
* A deep understanding of various phases of project lifecycle (prepare, explore, realize, deploy) and a good understanding of S/4HANA product roadmap and knowledge of relevant delivery methods for SAP (waterfall, hybrid agile, agile)
* Have a team player attitude and hunger to develop new professional skills.
* Understanding of the SAP cloud offerings -RISE and GROW

Additionally, to ensure smooth start and succeeding in the role, it is required from the applicant to:


* Hold a master’s degree or similar relevant educational background with 5-10 years of relevant SAP experience - preferably across multiple industries. Also, a background with at least some experience in leading and/or coordinating your own stream.
* Broad SAP functional and technical expertise in your own process area with a good understanding of integrations between SAP modules and other applications
* Have previous consulting, project delivery and sales/pre-sales experience working with multiple large clients both with business and IT stakeholders.
* Ability to conceptualize and communicate complex topics in a clear and understandable manner.
* Be fluent in both written and spoken English with excellent communication and presentation skills. Proficiency in Swedish language seen as advantage but not required.
**Additional Information**
--------------------------

**We offer**

At Deloitte, we are committed to helping our employees grow and develop throughout their career. We offer a range of on-the-job learning experiences, formal development programs at Deloitte University, and access to a personal coach to support you in identifying and utilizing your strengths. We also provide the necessary training and resources for you to obtain various certifications to further advance in your career.
  

  

Our culture is built on collaboration and innovation. We value diverse perspectives and encourage our employees to think creatively to find the best solutions for our clients. We work hand-in-hand with our clients to understand their unique needs and to develop tailored solutions that drive growth and innovation. At Deloitte, you´ll have the chance to grow and succeed alongside like-minded professionals who share your passion.
  

  

**How to apply**

Your application should consist of a CV and a cover letter and you apply directly online. Please apply as soon as possible as we will review applications and interview candidates on an ongoing basis.
  

  

*As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with To Find Out.* *https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/*  

  

**Questions?**

For questions regarding the application process or the role, please contact Rasmus Öhman, rohman@deloitte.se .
  

  

**We are looking forward to your application!**  

  

For further information on Deloitte, please visit www.deloitte.se


**What impact will you make?**

Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.


**Job Location**
----------------
company_description: We’re a leading professional services firm, but what makes working at Deloitte unique? When you join us, you become connected. To inspiring people. To meaningful work with fascinating clients.

title: Accountant
description:
**Join Paligo as an Accountant and Drive Customer-First Success in a Leading SaaS Company!**

 **WHO WE ARE**


Paligo is an industry-leading SaaS company in the field of Component Content Management. We enable global team collaboration with our cloud-based CCMS product, developed to create, manage, publish, and translate technical, knowledge, and product documentation.


Paligo is used by some of the world’s leading companies, including Bitdefender, Bluetooth, Mitsubishi, the European Commission, Wrike, Alteryx, and many more. Our goal is to become the number one solution in the industry by providing an exceptional product, great value, and excelling in customer satisfaction. Now, we need you to help us get to the next level!

**ABOUT THE ROLE**


We are seeking a skilled and proactive Accountant to join our finance team at our headquarters in Solna, Stockholm. Reporting to the Head of Finance, you will be responsible for managing various aspects of our financial operations, ensuring accuracy, compliance, and efficiency within our accounting processes.

**Key Responsibilities**

**Accounts Payable Management:** Handle invoices, manage vendor communication, and ensure timely payments.

**Financial Data Analysis:** Analyze financial data to identify cost-saving opportunities and resolve discrepancies.

**Vendor Management:** Oversee new vendor requests, ensuring compliance with budget and policies; manage vendor agreements, including tracking renewals, costs, and terms.

**Bank Transaction Reconciliation:** Record and reconcile manual bank transactions within our automated system.

**Month-End and Year-End Close:** Assist with month-end and year-end close processes.

**Compliance and Regulation:** Ensure adherence to company policies and financial regulations.

**Expense Management:** Manage company cards and oversee expense reporting.


General Financial Support: Provide financial support across various departments and functions within the company.

**QUALIFICATIONS**

* Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.

* Proven experience in accounting or finance roles.

* Strong understanding of accounting and VAT legislation.

* Excellent analytical skills with attention to detail.

* Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.

* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

 **WHAT WE OFFER**

* Joining Paligo means being at the heart of what makes us unique. Your work will directly impact our operations, and you'll have the opportunity to grow and develop your skills in a highly expansive company surrounded by exceptional colleagues and customers worldwide.
* We are in an exciting transition from a startup to a scale-up, offering a dynamic environment where your contributions will play a key role in our growth journey.
* We always strive to be a company with a customer-first culture, meaning that a customer-first approach is key in everything we do, coupled with a relentless service-minded attitude.
* We believe in candid communication, collaboration, and promoting a healthy work culture.

* Paligo is an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

  

Are you interested in our company culture, values, and which people you will work with? Check in our career page here!

title: Senior Data Analyst to Electromobility
description:
Are you a person who wants to be part of changing the future by creating transport solutions towards a more sustainable environment? We at Volvo Group are constantly moving and changing to be one step ahead in the technology journey. Within Volvo Group Trucks Technology, we are adapting and challenging ourselves to be able to develop new breakthrough transport solutions. We strive to add value and the best solutions to our customers while being energy efficient, sustainable, and safer for society. That’s the reason we are looking for a senior data analyst.

 **What do we do?**  

We belong to Complete Electric Propulsion System and Platform in Electromobility. A dynamic department taking care of architecture and platform of all new and current projects/products, both physical and virtual.  

You will be part of the Productivity Services team. We are responsible to develop service enablers. The most important is our Energy API which is a set of APIs that carry predictive algorithms of energy consumption and charging behaviors. Our team is formed by system engineers, data scientists, analysts and cloud engineers that are passioned about coding, working with data validation and transforming ideas into functionalities.

 **What will you do?**  

To validate our services, we must have good datasets and pipelines with data from our products (trucks and buses). Your responsibility will be to work and lead the development of this databases and structure for validation. Also be able to do specific analysis in the available data so we can get insights of improvements to be done in the algorithms.

 **Who are you?**  

We believe that to be successful in the position, you are a team player and have strong experience in analytics, data management, python coding and data domain and software. You have data analytics experience working in cross-functional teams. You have a willingness to learn, collaborate and take more responsibility with a can-do attitude. You have positive attitude, are kind to others and enjoy being surrounded by energetic people with solution-oriented mindsets.

 **Requirements:**  

* Bachelor’s in data science, Computer Science, engineering, or equivalents.
* 3+ years of experience working with data analytics in SW development teams.
* Python language programing skills
* Experience of working with relevant technical tools like GitHub, Cloud analytics, PowerBI, SQL, Data Bricks, etc.
* Experience in Analytics with time spent on driving and implementing Advanced Analytics/Data Science insights, preferably in a global environment.
* Experience of working in an Agile environment.
* Good communication skills in English, both spoken and written.
 **It’s a merit to have:**  

* Master degree in the relevant domains.
* Experience working with high resolution data from test- and customer vehicles
* If you have previous experiences of product development within a product organization and/or worked with energy management, it is a plus.
  

We are looking forward to receiving your application! Don’t hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions or want to know more about this role.


Last application is 2 of September.

  

Luiz Thereza. Group Manager Productivity Services, luiz.thereza@volvo.com

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group.**

 **Group Trucks Technology** are seeking talents to help design sustainable transportation solutions for the future. As part of our team, you’ll help us by engineering exciting next-gen technologies and contribute to projects that determine new, sustainable solutions. Bring your love of developing systems, working collaboratively, and your advanced skills to a place where you can make an impact. Join our design shift that leaves society in good shape for the next generation.
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: Enterprise Account Executive - Red Hat Sales (Stockholm Office, Sweden)
description:
The Red Hat Enterprise Sales team is looking for an Enterprise Account Executive to join us in Sweden. In this role, you will be responsible for retaining and growing sales within enterprise accounts within various verticals, helping our customers and partners make business and IT transformations using Red Hat services and solutions. As an Enterprise Account Executive, you will gain an understanding of our customers’ processes, needs, and challenges while promoting the value of Red Hat’s solutions and how they can deliver value to the customer.  

What you will bring* Deliver on the account strategy to increase performance and customer success in key accounts, retaining and growing bookings through strategic account planning
* Translate Red Hat’s sales strategy into a relevant account-level strategy for each customer
* Apply knowledge of use cases and Red Hat’s strategic offering value proposition to identify and deliver opportunities to increase upsell, cross-sell, and renewals across the Red Hat portfolio while increasing presence within accounts
* Coordinate Solution Architects, specialist teams, Customer Success team, and industry experts to align Red Hat use cases to customer needs, guiding end-to-end sales to develop solutions that deliver business value
* Coordinate support from Solutions Architects, Sales Specialists and industry experts to guide end-to-end sales and deliver customer value
* Cultivate relationships across customer organizations to position Red Hat as a strategic partner to their business
* Collaborate with the Customer Success team to co-develop Success and Growth Plans, understanding how the customer derives value from Red Hat’s solutions to support expansion and retention and ensure that Red Hat meets or exceeds the customer’s success criteria
* Engage partners to strengthen Red Hat’s customer value proposition


What you will do* Excellent leadership and communication skills with ability to engage a diverse set of stakeholders in a matrixed organization and increase accountability within the account team
* Strategic orientation and value engineering skills to position and sell solutions to meet the customers’ needs and build business cases around ROI and total cost of ownership (TCO)
* Excellent understanding of customers’ business, industry trends, competitive landscape, and Red Hat differentiators and value proposition
* English and Swedish language skills
* Willingness to travel across Sweden, mostly Stockholm area


About Red Hat  

Red Hat is the world’s leading provider of enterprise open source software solutions, using a community-powered approach to deliver high-performing Linux, cloud, container, and Kubernetes technologies. Spread across 40+ countries, our associates have the flexibility to choose the work environment that suits their needs from in-office to fully remote to office-flex. Red Hatters are encouraged to bring their best ideas, no matter their title or tenure. We're a leader in open source because of our open and inclusive environment. We hire creative, passionate people ready to contribute their ideas, help solve complex problems, and make an impact. Opportunities are open. Join us.
Diversity, Equity & Inclusion at Red Hat  

Red Hat’s culture is built on the open source principles of transparency, collaboration, and inclusion, where the best ideas can come from anywhere and anyone. When this is realized, it empowers people from diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and experiences to come together to share ideas, challenge the status quo, and drive innovation. Our aspiration is that everyone experiences this culture with equal opportunity and access, and that all voices are not only heard but also celebrated. We hope you will join our celebration, and we welcome and encourage applicants from all the beautiful dimensions of diversity that compose our global village.
Equal Opportunity Policy (EEO)  

Red Hat is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and an affirmative action employer. We review applications for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, veteran status, genetic information, physical or mental disability, medical condition, marital status, or any other basis prohibited by law.  

Red Hat does not seek or accept unsolicited resumes or CVs from recruitment agencies. We are not responsible for, and will not pay, any fees, commissions, or any other payment related to unsolicited resumes or CVs except as required in a written contract between Red Hat and the recruitment agency or party requesting payment of a fee.  

Red Hat supports individuals with disabilities and provides reasonable accommodations to job applicants. If you need assistance completing our online job application, email application-assistance@redhat.com. General inquiries, such as those regarding the status of a job application, will not receive a reply.
company_description: Red Hat is the world’s leading provider of enterprise open source solutions, using a community-powered approach to deliver high-performing Linux, cloud, container, and Kubernetes technologies.

title: Senior Mid Enterprise Account Manager, Sweden
description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!*We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business.*
About the job
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!  

  

*We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business.*  

  

Corporate Overview  

  

Proofpoint is a leading cybersecurity company protecting organizations’ greatest assets and biggest risks vulnerabilities in people. With an integrated suite of cloud-based solutions, Proofpoint helps companies around the world stop targeted threats, safeguard their data, and make their users more resilient against cyber attacks. Leading organizations of all sizes, including more than half of the Fortune 1000, rely on Proofpoint for people-centric security and compliance solutions mitigating their most critical risks across email, the cloud, social media, and the web.  

  

We are singularly devoted to helping our customers protect their greatest assets and biggest security risk their people. That’s why we’re a leader in next-generation cybersecurity.  

  

The Role  

  

We are seeking a highly motivated Senior Middle Enterprise Account Manager based in Stockholm to further develop the Swedish territory.  

  

You will be tasked with converting prospects into sales by differentiating from the competition and working with channel partners to build and grow a joint Proofpoint business. The role will demand interaction with small and medium sized enterprises up to CISO level, as well as with technical staff within the security and IT organisation.  

  

This individual will also work closely with the Sales Engineer team, as well as with partners and leverage the power of corporate resources within their account base.  

  

The successful candidate will be results oriented and possess excellent business acumen. Additionally, this person should have proven ability to build business pipeline, accurately forecast and close business with interpersonal and presentational skills.  

  

Your day-to-day* Focus on hunting and developing New Logo Accounts (cross vertical) up to 2,500 users.
* In this role you will focus on increasing market share of Proofpoint products through outbound telephone prospecting to commercial accounts within an assigned region.
* You will be responsible for planning, coordinating, and delivering web based and onsite product demos.
* Work with Sales Engineers to prepare account strategies and plans.
* Partner with the channel to drive incremental revenue.
* Focus on hunting and developing new Proofpoint accounts in the market.


What You Bring To The Team* This person should have proven ability to build business pipeline, accurately forecast and close business with interpersonal and presentational skills.
* Outstanding written and verbal communication skills and be able to clearly and effectively articulate Proofpoint’s value.
* Must be organised, detail and process oriented.
* Ability to coordinate Proofpoint resources to execute a complex sales strategy.
* Experience of using Salesforce (or similar CRM tools) is a plus
* Successful inside sales experience in related field.
* Experience selling to IT departments and IT management is preferred.
* Existing channel relationships and ideally have an understanding of a 2-tier channel
* Self-starter with the ability to work in a hybrid work environment.
* Fluent Swedish and English language skills required.
* Any additional language skills are a plus.


Why Proofpoint  

  

Protecting people is at the heart of our award-winning cybersecurity solutions, and the people who work here are the key to our success. We’re a customer-focused and driven-to-win organisation with leading-edge products. We are an inclusive, diverse, multinational company that believes in culture fit, but more importantly ‘culture-add’, and we strongly encourage people from all walks of life to apply.  

  

We believe in hiring the best and the brightest to help cultivate our culture of collaboration and appreciation. Apply today and explore your future at Proofpoint!  

  

*If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!**If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!*
company_description: Proofpoint helps organizations protect their people. Our integrated, cloud-based suite of people-centric compliance and security solutions helps mitigate today’s security and compliance risks.

title: Group Business Controller - Forecasting
description:
Sinch is a Customer Communication Cloud company, directly powering meaningful conversations at scale across messaging, voice and email to help businesses deliver unified, personalized experiences that truly revolve around their customers - no matter the channels they use. More than 150,000 businesses - including many of the world's largest tech companies, rely on us for their customer communication needs.
  
  

We dream big - for our company, our customers and our employees - and we hire the best talent worldwide to help us bring our vision to life. We have near 4,500 Sinchers in more than 60 countries - probably somewhere near you!
  
  

About The Role
  
As the forecasting lead within Group FP&A, you will drive the Budget and forecasting processes for the Group from start to finish. You will own the full planning with all our local reporters as your main stakeholders. You will visualize and design Sinch’s forecasting reports to various stakeholders, management group and Board of directors. Furthermore, you will own the planning and development for our forecasting tool Anaplan. This role provides a great opportunity for you to have a significant impact, and make a mark on Group FP&A, including its work going forward.
  
  

This role is based at our HQ in Stockholm, Sweden but we are open to other major Sinch European locations as well. The role reports to Head of Group FP&A.
  
Key Responsibilities
  
* Owning the Budget and Forecasting timeline planning during the year.
* Structuring information materials and knowledge sharing.
* Onboarding new colleges in our forecasting processes.
* Develop our Group wide forecasting tool Anaplan
* Build and manage Budget reporting packages to management group and Board.


About You
  
To be successful in this role requires a blend of visionary and strategic thinking with a practical, hands-on approach. Your communication skills are excellent—clear, concise, and engaging—allowing you to effectively influence and connect with diverse stakeholder groups. You are highly organized with excellent time management skills. Last but not least, you have a passion for Excel and are highly skilled in PowerPoint, with a talent for simplifying complex data into digestible insights.
  
* Proven experience of Business Controlling at Group level in a large and international company
* Experience from project-based processes
* Experience in the following systems is a plus: Anaplan, Aaro, Tableau.
* Fluency in English is required


Our Values
  
At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple" and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation for fostering an environment where diversity of thinking, skills and experiences are embraced, delivering innovation and better business results.
  
  

Bring your authentic self to Sinch
  
Here at Sinch we embrace diversity and work to create an inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive. No matter who you are, you'll be able to explore new career and growth options - sharing your voice, building your path and making it happen with us.
  
  

We're proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and all qualified applicants will be considered to join our team regardless of race, color, religion, creed, gender, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, sex, gender expression or identity, sexual orientation, citizenship, or any other legally protected class.
  
  

Our Hiring Process
  
At Sinch, we are committed to following a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and non-discriminatory. We use pre-employment assessment to create an inclusive application experience to help foster diverse and high performing teams.
  
  

Even if you do not meet all job requirements, don't let that stop you from considering Sinch for the next step in your career. We are always looking for people that could help us pioneer the way the world communicates.
  
  

If this role isn't what you're looking for, please consider other open roles on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/
company_description: We help companies to communicate with customers via messaging, voice and video using multiple channels. Simplifying life by bringing all people and businesses together using technology is our purpose.

title: Experienced professionals to our SAP Finance team (Malmö)
description:
Deloitte is looking for talented and experienced professionals to join our SAP-team in Sweden. As a market leader, we work with both global and local organizations on complex transformations, including major business-driven IT changes. With approximately 25,000 SAP experts in over 135 countries, Deloitte is among SAP’s most valued strategic partners. This is why SAP has placed Deloitte within the highest strategic alliance partner category, and why we have been recognized as the Global Leader in SAP Services by leading consultancies and analysts such as Forrester and Gartner.


We are looking for **senior SAP Finance professionals** who have an appetite for delivering sustainable, business-driven projects and being excited to co-operate with the largest companies and well-known brands. You enjoy engaging with clients to understand their requirements and find solution options for key challenges in finance area providing subject matter expertise with a good awareness of SAP and associated technologies within the process area.


**Qualifications**
------------------

Your most important attributes we’d like to see are:


* Thorough expertise in finance related SAP S/4HANA areas/competences such as Central Finance, FI/CO, Margin & Profitability Analysis, Project accounting with PS, Product Costing, Master Data modelling, Understanding of end to end process like Order to Cash, Procure to Pay or other
* Good understanding of SAP S/4HANA product roadmap (experience of other related SAP solutions such as e.g. Group Reporting, SAC is advantageous but not required) and knowledge of relevant delivery methods for SAP (waterfall, hybrid agile, agile) preferably with deployment experience e.g. global template rollouts
* Great addition (but not must) if the candidate has a high level understanding of the SAP cloud offerings -RISE and GROW

Additionally, to ensure smooth start and succeeding in the role, it is required from the applicant to:


* Hold a master’s degree or similar relevant educational background with years of relevant SAP experience - preferably across multiple industries. Broad SAP functional and technical expertise in your own process area with a good understanding of integrations between SAP modules and other applications
* Have previous consulting, project delivery and sales/pre-sales experience working with multiple large clients both with business and IT stakeholders
* Be fluent in both written and spoken English with excellent communication and presentation skills, and an ability to conceptualize and communicate complex topics in a clear and understandable manner. Proficiency in Swedish language seen as an advantage but is not required.
**Additional Information**
--------------------------

**We offer**

At Deloitte, we are committed to helping our employees grow and develop throughout their career. We offer a range of on-the-job learning experiences, formal development programs at Deloitte University, and access to a personal coach to support you in identifying and utilizing your strengths. We also provide the necessary training and resources for you to obtain various certifications to further advance in your career.
  

  

Our culture is built on collaboration and innovation. We value diverse perspectives and encourage our employees to think creatively to find the best solutions for our clients. We work hand-in-hand with our clients to understand their unique needs and to develop tailored solutions that drive growth and innovation. At Deloitte, you´ll have the chance to grow and succeed alongside like-minded professionals who share your passion.
  

  

**How to apply**

Your application should consist of a CV and a cover letter and you apply directly online. Please apply as soon as possible as we will review applications and interview candidates on an ongoing basis.
  

  

*As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with To Find Out.* *https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/*  

  

**Questions?**

For questions regarding the application process or the role, please contact Rasmus Öhman, rohman@deloitte.se .
  

  

**We are looking forward to your application!**  

  

For further information on Deloitte, please visit www.deloitte.se


**What impact will you make?**

Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.


**Job Location**
----------------
company_description: We’re a leading professional services firm, but what makes working at Deloitte unique? When you join us, you become connected. To inspiring people. To meaningful work with fascinating clients.

title: Financial Engineer \u007C SEB Investment Management, Stockholm
description:
SEB is a leading northern European financial services group with a full-service offering to private individuals, corporate and institutional clients. SEB Asset Management is one of the leading asset management companies in the Nordic region, managing a broad range of funds and mandates across asset classes. Our mission is to use sustainable investments to create a brighter economic future for our clients.

SEB xAsset Investment team is a unit within SEB Asset Management. We manage active balanced funds with AuM 100+ Bn SEK. Different product families are used to support the needs of our distribution channels. Our investment philosophy is to a large extent a topdown process from macro and themes to markets and portfolio construction. The team is working close to the Asset Allocation team, responsible for running the SEB House View process, supporting allocation overall in the bank. We are now seeking a financial engineer or a quantitative developer to engineering unit within the team.
**About the role:**
You will be part of a team that develops technical aspects of the company’s strategy to ensure alignment with the business goals. As such, the team has the overall responsibility of technology, architecture and proprietary systems that are built upon the platform delivered by SEB Group. This includes supporting the organization with tools and systems needed for creating a system environment for the operational implementations for investment management. The team works closely with portfolio managers and trading unit as well as other parts of the organisation.

As a member of the Engineering team you will:* Ensure correct availability for the systems in the operational environment is included.


- Manage roadmaps, tasks and deadlines to assure correct prioritization of requirements to address both long- and short-term needs.* Be a proactive speaking partner to the different investment and business teams that interacts with the team.
* Be the driving and encouraging force behind the chosen technology for the organisation.

 **Who are you?*** You’re a structured person with a strong delivery focus that also enjoys challenges.
* You have demonstrable development experience.
* You have an experience in the asset management or market trading industry: designing, implementing and managing system frameworks for research and investments.
* Skilled in Object-oriented programming and enterprise architecture, interest in Cloud based technologies like GCP, Azure.
* You are proficient in C#
* Knowledge in Java and Python is a plus
* You have interests in Quantitative/Systematic investment strategies
* You have a relevant academic degree in computer science, engineering or equivalent.

 **What we offer**
SEB Investment Management offers an attractive and international learning environment. We aim to attract exceptional individuals with a desire to grow their own skillset as well as provide exceptional service to their clients. You will work side by side with a diverse team of experienced colleagues and get the chance to build strong network internally as well as externally.

At SEB and it is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe and where they come from.

Learn more about working at SEB on www.sebgroup.com/career
**Application details**
Please send in your CV and a personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to the SEB Strategy and Macro Research team. Candidates will be reviewed and selected on an ongoing basis, and you are welcome to submit your application as soon as possible, but no later than September 13th 2024. If you have any questions about the position, you can reach out to Yijin Zhou, Head of IM Tech & Engineering, on Yijin.zhou@seb.se. We look forward to hearing from you!

Great people often know great people – please share if you have a friend who would love this job.
company_description: More than 15.000 people work at SEB. Working in SEB means being part of an exciting journey, driven by digital transformation

title: Fullstack Engineer – Retail Point of Sale, Solna or Copenhagen
description:
*At PostNord IT, we build the best digital customer solutions for the Nordic markets. Some examples are PostNord App, Skicka Direkt, PostNord Portal and Postcard App. Live tracking, parcel robots and digital postage are some of the latest services we have developed. Find out more about us on LinkedIn.*

**Our Area and the Team**
-------------------------


We, the Partner Solutions area, are responsible for the solutions that are used at our 3 600 Service Points in Sweden, Denmark and Finland. We also handle the support tools in Backoffice and the Parcel Locker integration in the Nordic Countries. These solutions are central to our growth.

**We are now looking for a Fullstack Engineer to the Retail POS Team**. This team focus on the freight offering we sell directly to our customers at our Service Points in Sweden and Denmark.


Developers that are part of this team have the option to take lead on specific projects and act as a representative for the PostNord Retail POS Team. The support of the team and the tech lead will always be very close if needed.


We believe that you enjoy working in an agile environment where you get great opportunities to be involved and influence the work and the technical choices. You should also love to learn about new technologies/solutions and get acquainted with new contexts since this is part of our everyday life in the PostNord Retail POS team.


The Team is always in focus so it’s important that you are a good team player.


Some of our technologies/techniques:

* Microservices/Serverless
* TypeScript/JavaScript
* Java
* NodeJS
* AWS - Lambda, DynamoDB, SQS, S3 to name a few.
* REST
* Android and iOS native platforms.

**We are looking for you**
--------------------------

### **Experience: (Need-to-have)**

* Experience in working with serverless architecture and AWS.
* Experience in working with up to date web development
* Able to write testable and maintainable code.
* Experience of working with agile methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban
* As a person, you are committed, responsible and unpretentious.  

Some years of experience as a cloud backend developer and also from recent Web development.

### **Meritorious experience: (Nice-to-have)**


Knowledge in PostNord system landscape with focus on the Retail Domain.

**System requirement:**
-----------------------

### **Engineer cloud AWS focus**

* Good knowledge of AWS Principes and how to build serverless architectures
* Tech Stack: Dynamo DB, PostgreSQL, S3, EventBridge, SNS/SQS, API GW
* Experience in Serverless Framework is a merit
* Experience/curiosity in front-end development (React, Vue, Angular) is a merit
* Experience in docker/container solutions like EC2, Fargate is a merit.

### **Engineer frontend web focus**

* Knowledge of Vue3, or other web app frameworks like React or Angular
* Knowledge in test automation frameworks like Cypress are a merit
* Experience with hosting web apps on AWS and CloudFront and Route 53 setup is a merit

### **Language requirement:**


English in speech and writing. Proficiency in at least one Scandinavian language is meritorious

**We offer you**
----------------

* Flexible hybrid workplace with an open working climate.
* Good development and career opportunities.
* Good insurance and occupational pension conditions.
* Wellness allowance and access to office gym and swimming pool.
* Employee benefits through PostNord's own employee foundation PostNord Plus.
* Employment according to a collective agreement.

**We make everyday life easier**
--------------------------------


PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless if we lead our self or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at postnord.com.

**Apply**
---------


What are you waiting for? Welcome with your application. Seleselection will be continuously, so apply as soon as possible. If you have any questions about the position, email mats.sandblom@postnord.com. Please note that we do not accept applications by email.


We look forward to hearing from you!
